data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dijkstra, Klaas-Douwe B. (2007): Gone with the wind: westward dispersal across the Indian Ocean and island speciation in Hemicordulia dragonflies (Odonata: Corduliidae). Zootaxa 1438: 27-48, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.175929
